# Linux 下ORACLE的SID_NAME不可亂改  

這個SID_NAME關係到監聽問題,即使大小寫寫錯也會導致監聽無法正常鏈接到數據庫.

SQLNET.AUTHENTICATION_SERVICES具體配置查看http://www.xifenfei.com/1843.html
<br />
SQLNET.AUTHENTICATION_SERVICES我的測試結果爲:
<br />
=ALL 時http://127.0.0.1:5560/isqlplus無法正常鏈接到數據庫
<br />
=NTS  =NONE 時,進行connect /as sysdba操作時提示權限不足
<br />
```
####################################
# sqlnet.ora Network Configuration File: /home/oracle/oracle/product/10.2.0/db_1/network/admin/sqlnet.ora
# Generated by Oracle configuration tools.
#SQLNET.AUTHENTICATION_SERVICES= (ALL)
NAMES.DIRECTORY_PATH= (TNSNAMES, EZCONNECT)


##################################
# listener.ora Network Configuration File: /home/oracle/oracle/product/10.2.0/db_1/network/admin/listener.ora
# Generated by Oracle configuration tools.

SID_LIST_LISTENER =
  (SID_LIST =
    (SID_DESC =
      (PROGRAM = extproc)
      (SID_NAME = orcl)
      (ORACLE_HOME = /home/oracle/oracle/product/10.2.0/db_1)
    )
    (SID_DESC =
      (ORACLE_HOME = /home/oracle/oracle/product/10.2.0/db_1)
      (SID_NAME = orcl)
    )
  )
#開啓兩個局域網IP監聽和本機監聽
LISTENER =
  (DESCRIPTION_LIST =
    (DESCRIPTION =
      (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = IPC)(KEY = EXTPROC1))
    )
    (DESCRIPTION =
      (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = 127.0.0.1)(PORT = 1521))
    )
    (DESCRIPTION =
      (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = 192.168.2.166)(PORT = 1521))
    )
  )
```

```
#######################################
# tnsnames.ora Network Configuration File: /home/oracle/oracle/product/10.2.0/db_1/network/admin/tnsnames.ora
# Generated by Oracle configuration tools.

LYTEST =
  (DESCRIPTION =
    (ADDRESS_LIST =
      (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = 10.37.74.165)(PORT = 1521))
    )
    (CONNECT_DATA =
      (SERVICE_NAME = lytest)
    )
  )

ORCL =
  (DESCRIPTION =
    (ADDRESS_LIST =
      (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = 127.0.0.1)(PORT = 1521))
    )
    (CONNECT_DATA =
      (SERVICE_NAME = orcl)
    )
  )

LYMIS =
  (DESCRIPTION =
    (ADDRESS_LIST =
      (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = 10.37.74.165)(PORT = 1521))
    )
    (CONNECT_DATA =
      (SERVICE_NAME = lymis)
    )
  )

EXTPROC_CONNECTION_DATA =
  (DESCRIPTION =
    (ADDRESS_LIST =
      (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = IPC)(KEY = EXTPROC1))
    )
    (CONNECT_DATA =
      (SID = orcl)
      (PRESENTATION = RO)
    )
  )
```
